prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a beautiful young asian woman, long straight black hair, stern yet youthful expression, wearing a high-quality dark green trench coat, realistic skin texture
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high contrast environmental lighting, hyperdetailed skin pores, detailed texture on the green trench coat fabric, sharp focus on eyes and face
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet hair, blurry coat, flat lighting, low quality, exaggerated youthful look
